thread.section_title: Palm Gallery Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel - Review of Palm Gallery Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Scott L
title: Fantastic hotel
text:
As soon as we arrived we were shown outside for our welcome drinks with snacks , this was so relaxing sat in the sun in the quiet street the hotel is located . The hotel is kept very well , clean rooms, beds made every day and very polite and attentive staff .
To get into the city is a five minute walk to the bus stop or around â‚¬12 for a cab . You can also catch the tram from close by .
Local restaurants are very good . The hotel staff point these out on arrival as well as all the tourist spots on the map in Rome and the fantastic parks also close by . I don't have a bad word to say about palm gallery hotel . When we come back to Rome I'll be sure to stay here .
